ovdesc.p: This application in used to adjust the withholding income or tax rate of the entitlement transaction and create the FUNDS.TRANSFER record for the overall adjusted amount based on the parameters set in SC.WHT.ADJ.PARAM . Records in this application is eitheir created manually or on authorizing SC.PROCESS.WHT.ADJ record.

desc.p: The customer in the corresponding entitlement record defined in the TXN.ID field. Validation error is raised if all the entitlements are not belong to the same customer. Mandatory field
Valid TAX.TYPE id to which adjustment needs to be made.
Whether the adjustment is for over or under withholding.
Over - Debit the account in the field REIMB.TAX.ACCT.CAT and credit the customer account in the field REIMB.CU.ACCOUNT
Under - Credit the account in the field REIMB.TAX.ACCT.CAT and debit the customer account in the field REIMB.CU.ACCOUNT
Date is used to update DEBIT.VALUE.DATE or CREDIT.VALUE.DATE of the FUNDS.TRANSFER record created after adjustment.
Non Madatory field. Defaulted to today if the field doesnt have value.
Currency is used to calculate the final adjustment amount and for creating FUNDS.TRANSFER record.
The entitlement ID of the original taxable transaction.
The security Master ID from the entitlement record.

Whether the withholding was done at source or local (for the original transaction). If ADJ SOURCE is set to NO in SC.WHT.ADJ.PARAM application, then the transactions with tax deducted at source neither will not be selected on service nor will not be allowed to input.
Transaction date from the entitlement record.
Transation currency from the entitlement record.
Entitlement amount from the entitlement record.
Tax able income calculated based on the exemption set in SC.DIARY.EXEMPT.INCOME and SC.WHT.SOURCE.LOCAL. Defaulted from the SC.WHT.INC.BASE.
Tax rate used to compute the tax amount based on the CUSTOMER.CHARGE.
Original tax amount computed while creating the entitlement
The account credited as part of the original transaction.
The currency of the Cu Acct No field.
The net amount credited to the account as part of original transaction. Noinput Field
Tax account to which the tax amounts were originally posted.
Tax amount posted in customer account currency.
The currency for the income/tax adjustment given in NEW.WHT.INCOME field.
New withholdable Income on which new tax based on New tax rate will be calculated and populated in New Tax amt field
If no value then defaulted with latest WHT income.
It is the exchange rate between the event currency and the adjustment amount currency
The income adjusted in event currency. If adjusted currency is not given or is the same as event currency, then this will be the same as NEW.WHT.INCOME field

The revised tax rate (if any) can be specified here. If not specified, the value from TAX.RATE field will be used for computing the tax. If only the NEW.TAX.RATE is given (without NEW.WHT.INCOME), the tax on latest withholdable income will be calculated using this revised rate and the new tax amount is posted.
The new calculated tax amount in event currency.
Exchange rate between the tax currency and the adjustment amount currency
Adjusted tax amount in event currency
Adjusted tax amount in local currency
Total adjusted tax amount in tax currency for which FUNDS.TRANSFER record will be created.

Category to which reimburstment of tax amount should be credit or debited based on the option in ADJ.TYPE field. This field is defaulted from the field REIMBURSE.CAT of the application SC.WHT.ADJ.PARAM. If the field REIMBURSE.CAT is not specified then this field should be a valid account.
Adjusted tax amount in event currency
